contextId.information: Here, these phrases do not refer to a specific person but to humans in general, including both males and females. AT: "made humans ... crowned them ... their feet ... to them" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_genericnoun]] and [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_gendernotations]])
contextId.quote: made man ... crowned him ... his feet ... to him

contextId.information: This refers to all the believers to whom he is writing whether male or female. AT: "fellow believers" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_gendernotations]])
